text:
[Verse]
Wake up see the light
Dreams are in the air
Blue skies shining bright
Come away come where

[Verse 2]
Feel the morning breeze
Touch the summer glow
Dance under the trees
Let your spirit flow

[Chorus]
Sunshine in my soul
Moving makes me whole
Laughing all the way
Celebrate today

[Verse 3]
Colors everywhere
Paint the world anew
Magic in the air
Everything feels true

[Verse 4]
Smiles on every face
Joy in every step
Hearts begin to trace
Rhythms that are kept

[Chorus]
Sunshine in my soul
Moving makes me whole
Laughing all the way
Celebrate today
title: Sunshine Dreams
